pages.text: Ultimate Compression has a compressed version of all vanilla tools. They are crafted in the same way as usual but they will have increased durability and might give a bonus potion effect.

pages.title: Hoes
pages.text: All the tools recipes are similar as Vanilla Minecraft. For any further information you can always check the Official Ultimate Compression Wiki or check the recipes shown within JEI. $(br)$(l:https://github.com/VoidCallerZ/UltimateCompression_1.18.x/wiki)Official Ultimate Compression Wiki$(/l)
